vector.description: Update `rule_specs/vectorguard/00_base_rule.yml` and `rule_specs/vectorscan/00_base_rule.yml` to add `severity` and `remediation_hint`, and add one concrete non-template rule each
Implement per-product adapter modules exposing `evaluate(resource)` that call canonical executor or product logic
Assign product owners for `vectorguard` and `vectorscan` and add PR/CI validation workflow for schema promotion

compute.description: Update `rule_specs/computeguard/00_base_rule.yml` and `rule_specs/computescan/00_base_rule.yml` to add `severity` and `remediation_hint`, and add at least one concrete rule per product
Implement per-product adapters exposing `evaluate(resource)` or map checklist invocation to pipeline executor via adapters
Assign compute product owners and add unit/integration tests validating schema and evaluator bindings

pipeline.description: Document and implement canonical adapter mapping `run_pipeline_on_text` -> `evaluate(resource)` under `strategy_e/adapters/`
Update pipeline base template rules with `severity` and `remediation_hint` and add concrete rules
Add unit/integration tests and CI jobs that validate executor↔adapter↔schema flow

global_unblock_actions.description: Promote all ai_reports/schema_templates/*.schema.yml into `products/<product>/schema.yml` in small PRs with schema validation enforced by CI
Complete all base template rules across pillars by adding required metadata (`severity`, `remediation_hint`) and ensure at least one concrete rule per product
Implement canonical adapter layer and per-product adapters exposing `evaluate(resource)`; validate with tests
Assign owners for orphan rule_specs and add promotion workflows (CI + PR templates)

notes: Sequencing tags: early = unblock structural prerequisites (schemas, core adapter), mid = content & adapter implementation (rules, per-product adapters), late = governance, tests, and CI polishing.
Recommended approach: execute schema promotions in small, reviewable PRs with CI validation to reduce drift risk, then complete rule metadata and concrete rules, then implement adapters and tests.
This plan is derived from ai_reports/phase3_activation_gate.json and is intended as prescriptive guidance; adjust sequencing as teams assign owners.
